name: Sales Tax Collection
query:
select distinct
	SI.posting_date as InvoiceDate,
	SI.name as "Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:80" ,
	SI.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:120", 	
	SI.address_display as "Address:Data:120", 
	CASE  WHEN SI.base_total_taxes_and_charges > 0 THEN "YES" ELSE "NO" END AS TaxCollected,
	C.customers_license as "License:Data:80",
	SI.rounded_total as "GrossTotal:Float:100",
	SI.base_total_taxes_and_charges As "TaxAmount:Float:80",
	ROUND(SI.total_net_weight,2) as "SalesWeight:Float:100",
	ROUND(SI.total_net_weight * 2.20462,2) AS "WeightinLB:Float:100",
	DN.order_tracking_number as "Shipping:Data:100"
	FROM  `tabSales Invoice` as SI 
	INNER JOIN tabCustomer as C 
	ON SI.customer = C.customer_name
	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabDelivery Note Item` AS DNI	
	ON  SI.name = DNI.against_sales_invoice 
	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabDelivery Note` As DN 
	ON DNI.parent = DN.name
	WHERE SI.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and SI.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
